subject: Newbie: [Best Way To Instantiate Category]
msgSnippet: As I understand there are 2 ways to use Category intances: 1.Either make instances in every class (or package)(will this affect my performance in large J2EE
messageBody:
As I understand there are 2 ways to use Category intances:

1.Either make instances in every class (or package)(will this affect my
performance in large J2EE apps.?).
2.Make a static class (this might be an issue if I am using EJBs).

Now, suppose I have a large J2EE application (typically consisting of
numerous java files/jsps/ejbs distributed in various packages).What will be
the best method for me to use Category instance? (I am quite sure I am
sounding ignorant).

If this question has been asked before can anyone please forward that mail
to me?

Thanks,
Charlie
